Trigger.Name: Igeyorhm - Blizzard IV
Trigger.RegularExpression: 14:47C3:Igeyorhm's Shade starts using Blizzard IV on (?<name>[\w-' ]+)

Trigger.Name: Lahabrea - Fire IV
Trigger.RegularExpression: 14:47C2:Lahabrea's Shade starts using Fire IV on (?<name>[\w-' ]+)

Trigger.Name: Ascian Prime - Height of Chaos
Trigger.RegularExpression: 14:47D1:Ascian Prime's Shade starts using Height Of Chaos

Trigger.Name: Gunshield Check

Trigger.RegularExpression: \[.{14}14:4CD2:Varis Yae Galvus starts using Alea Iacta Est on Varis Yae Galvus

Trigger.Name: Altius - Blue X

Trigger.Name: Citius - TB
Trigger.RegularExpression: \[.{14}14:4CF0:Varis Yae Galvus starts using Citius on (?<player>[A-Za-z-' ]{3,21})

Trigger.Name: Ignis/Ventus Est - in/out
Trigger.RegularExpression: \[.{14}14:4C(?<move>B5|C6):Varis Yae Galvus starts using (?>Ignis|Ventus) Est on Varis Yae Galvus

Trigger.Name: Fortius - Puddles + Clock
Trigger.RegularExpression: \[.{14}14:4CE[56]:Varis Yae Galvus starts using Fortius on Varis Yae Galvus

Action.UseTTSTextExpression: Clock go far, then in, rotate, rotate

Trigger.Name: The Bitter End - TB+Swap
Trigger.RegularExpression: \[.{14}14:4F(?>28|0A):.+? starts using The Bitter End on (?<target>[a-zA-Z-' ]{3,21})\.
